channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 10:17 Threat of use of the copecreal use of managed aviation bombs
item.description: 🟠 10:17 Threat of use of the copecreal use of managed aviation bombs This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
